mapper.insert: insert into feed_event_status (feed_id, event_id, actual) select feed_id, #{eventId}, false from feeds where providers && array[#{provider}::text] on conflict (feed_id, event_id) do update set actual = false

insert into feed_event_status (feed_id, event_id, actual) select feed_id, #{eventId}, false from feeds where providers && array[#{provider}::text] and alias != #{excludeAlias} on conflict (feed_id, event_id) do update set actual = false
